identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

colors.rules: High contrast. No gradients on text. Use solid blocks of color.

containers.card: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-md shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all shadow-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all

inputs.default: h-10 rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-white file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-500 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-primary focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

cards.style: rounded-lg border border-slate-200 bg-white text-slate-950 shadow-sm

navigation.sidebar: w-64 border-r border-slate-200 bg-slate-50/50 h-screen sticky top-0
navigation.link: flex items-center gap-3 px-3 py-2 rounded-md text-sm font-medium text-slate-600 hover:text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 transition-colors

universal_guidelines: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
Do not use gradients for text.
Use 'recharts' for charts with custom colors.
instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the E1 persona. Build a high-contrast, professional finance dashboard. Use the provided color palette (Emerald/Lime) to create a unique look. Ensure the 'Customer Permission Toggle' feature is prominent in the Customer Management section.
